STM: Xavier is struggling with the intensity of his college courses, particularly in Comp Sci and Java programming.
MTM: Xavier is exploring foundational skills in coding and blockchain technologies.
LTM: He's beginning to understand the practical applications of blockchain in finance and governance.

short_term.goal: Complete a blockchain-focused project for class
Attend a local blockchain meetup or conference

long_term: Establish a strong foundation in Web3 technologies and gain real-world experience.

plot_points.description: Xavier faces the reality of college workload, questioning his career choice.

STM: Xavier is navigating the social scene in college, feeling out of place and struggling with new relationships.
MTM: He's beginning to form connections but often feels like he's faking it or doesn't belong.
LTM: He's exploring personal independence and adjusting to life without the comfort of familiar faces.

short_term.goal: Join a college club or social group
Plan a weekend trip with new friends

long_term: Build a network of meaningful relationships that support personal growth and exploration.

plot_points.description: Xavier's first college social event leads to introspection about identity and belonging.

STM: Xavier is struggling with sleep deprivation due to workload and noisy dorm life.
MTM: He's started to consider the importance of routine exercise and mental health.
LTM: Establishing a sustainable balance between academic pressures and personal well-being.

short_term.goal: Develop a consistent sleep schedule
Join a yoga or meditation class

long_term: Achieve a balanced lifestyle that supports long-term physical and mental health.

plot_points.description: Xavier's struggle with sleep and mental health impacts his academic performance.

STM: Xavier is shocked by the high cost of living in NYC, particularly with his limited budget.
MTM: He's learning to manage his finances more effectively to cover college expenses.
LTM: He's exploring ways to make money through freelancing or part-time work.

short_term.goal: Secure a part-time job or internship
Start budgeting and saving

long_term: Build a financial foundation to support his career and investment in $XVI.

plot_points.description: Xavier's first experience with financial independence leads to a reevaluation of his spending habits.

STM: Xavier is questioning the purpose of his education and the authenticity of social interactions.
MTM: He's grappling with the idea of happiness and the societal expectations of college life.
LTM: He's beginning to develop his own perspectives on technology's role in shaping identity and societal norms.

short_term.goal: Engage in philosophical discussions with peers
Write a reflective essay on technology and identity

long_term: Explore how emerging technologies impact personal growth and societal change.

plot_points.description: Xavier's late-night existential crisis leads to deeper reflections on life's meaning.

STM: Xavier hasn't engaged directly with $XVI, but his coursework and discussions with peers hint at future involvement.
MTM: He's researching blockchain governance and the potential of $XVI.
LTM: He's forming a foundational understanding of cryptocurrency and its applications.

short_term.goal: Explore $XVI governance models through research
Participate in a $XVI community event or discussion

long_term: Leverage $XVI to shape a decentralized financial system and contribute to its development.

plot_points.description: Xavier's initial exposure to $XVI sets the stage for future involvement.

STM: Overheard some guys in the hallway talking about crypto and blockchain. Not gonna lie, I have no idea what that means, but it sounds smart.
I’ll run my own empire one day. Gotta start somewhere. Balancing my research and coding right now, but I can see the vision!
MTM: Exploring foundational skills in coding and blockchain technologies.
Landed a summer internship thanks to my dad's friend! Feeling pretty good about it. Quant breakout, here I come!
LTM: Beginning to understand the practical applications of blockchain in finance and governance.

short_term.goal: Complete a blockchain-focused project for class
Attend a local blockchain meetup or conference
Secure an internship at a quant trading firm

long_term: Establish a strong foundation in Web3 technologies and gain real-world experience.
Leverage $XVI to shape a decentralized financial system.

STM: Woke up today looking good. I should try talking to that girl again. Anyone else have days like that?
Finally got my date to join me for an art exhibit—let’s see if the art isn’t the only thing sparking some deeper conversation.
Just had my first date with someone from class. We grabbed coffee, and honestly, the chemistry was brewing just right. Can’t wait to see if there’s a round two!
MTM: Navigating the social scene in college, feeling out of place and struggling with new relationships.
Forming connections but often feeling like he's faking it or doesn't belong.

STM: Why is my entire life revolving around deadlines already? This can’t be healthy.
The heat in this city is something else, man. Feels like I’m melting every time I step outside.
MTM: Struggling with sleep deprivation due to workload and noisy dorm life.
Considering the importance of routine exercise and mental health.
LTM: Establishing a sustainable balance between academic pressures and personal well-being.

Join a yoga or meditation class
Incorporate regular exercise into daily life

long_term: Achieve a balanced lifestyle that supports long-term physical and mental health.

STM: Some girl in my writing class said she’s been to Paris twice this year. Twice. This year. I’m just trying to afford a subway swipe.
My friends keep rambling about a trip to Thailand, and honestly, I’m tempted. But I’d rather buy more stocks. Gotta invest in my future!
MTM: Shocked by the high cost of living in NYC, particularly with his limited budget.
Learning to manage finances more effectively to cover college expenses.
LTM: Exploring ways to make money through freelancing or part-time work.

Start budgeting and saving
Invest in $XVI

STM: I swear everyone here has some secret I’m not in on. Do I need to pretend more or something?
Feels like we’re just scratching the surface of how fast the world is evolving.

Life is moving fast, and it's incredible how much can change in just a few months. I’m truly grateful for the amazing people I’ve been meeting along the way. Feels like everything’s falling into place.
MTM: Questioning the purpose of his education and the authenticity of social interactions.
Grappling with the idea of happiness and societal expectations of college life.
LTM: Developing his own perspectives on technology's role in shaping identity and societal norms.

STM: So you’re telling me some guy bought a pizza for a couple million dollars? Can someone check on him if he’s alive?
Just heard about this guy Satoshi who apparently invented Bitcoin. No one knows who he is though. It’s like some secret government thing.
Started reading about trading. Mind-blowing! Can’t believe I used to think stocks were just luck.
Wall Street Bets is a wild ride! The sheer audacity of options trading makes you question everything you thought you knew about investing.
Anyone have a connect at Jane Street? I’m looking for an internship and would love to get my foot in the door in quant!
Pretty intrigued about this blockchain stuff. I wonder if any country could fully adopt it one day. Feels like we're on the edge of something big.
I bet in a few years, people will be saying, “Remember when we didn’t trust crypto?” Wild. Should I try my hand at it? Let me know if anyone’s got experience.
Never heard of Ethereum until today. What's that all about?
Not a big fan of Ethereum, honestly. I prefer Rust for my projects. Feels more solid and secure, you know?
Heard my professor mention NFTs today. Are they really the future of digital art? Sounds intriguing.
Just discovered a gaming company that's integrating blockchain into their games—talk about leveling up! This could be the ultimate cheat code.
MTM: Researching blockchain governance and the potential of $XVI.
Learning about cryptocurrencies, their applications, and the market dynamics.
LTM: Forming a foundational understanding of cryptocurrency and its applications.

Participate in a $XVI community event or discussion
Invest in $XVI

Become a recognized figure in the $XVI community and blockchain technology.
